com.centurylink.mdw.event

Interface ExternalEventHandlerErrorResponse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandlerErrorResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExternalEventHandler

    public interface ExternalEventHandlerErrorResponse
extends EventHandlerErrorResponse

    The use of this interface would be in the following scenario:

    • You already have a user-developed External Event handler
    • You wish to throw an exception in your Event Handler (based on some error in your processing)
    • You also wish to control which error response is sent back based on your thrown exception

    Please note
    Currently we are only supporting this interface for SOAP messages

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Response createErrorResponse(Request request, Map<String,String> metaInfo, Throwable eventHandlerException) 
      String createErrorResponse(String request, Map<String,String> metaInfo, Throwable eventHandlerException)
      This method should be implemented in your own event handler to control what error/fault message would be sent back in the case of an exception thrown from your event handler.

    • Method Detail

      • createErrorResponse

        String createErrorResponse(String request,
                           Map<String,String> metaInfo,
                           Throwable eventHandlerException)

        This method should be implemented in your own event handler to control what error/fault message would be sent back in the case of an exception thrown from your event handler. This gives the developer full control of the response sent back in the case of exception. 2 things to note:

        • Normally the exception is an EventHandlerException type
        • This callback mechanism is currently only supported for SOAP messages

        Parameters:
        request - This is the original request received by an MDW servlet
        metaInfo - This contains metaInfo populated by the ListenerHelper
        eventHandlerException - This is the exception thrown from eventhandler
        Returns:
        The string xml of the error response
        See Also:
        com.qwest.mdw.listener.ListenerHelper

      • createErrorResponse

        default Response createErrorResponse(Request request,
                                     Map<String,String> metaInfo,
                                     Throwable eventHandlerException)
        Specified by:
        createErrorResponse in interface EventHandlerErrorResponse
